nodes.text: The Nomme was a Container transport under the service of the Empire, during the Galactic Civil War.

Following Grand Admiral Zaarin's unsuccessful coup at Coruscant, Zaarin sent his fleet to the Omar system to destroy the TIE Advanced starfighter manufacturing plants starting with the Manufacturing facilities Omar 1, 2 and 3. Unable to send a large fleet in time loyalist forces instead sent transports to evacuate as much personal as possible. Maarek Stele the Empire's most reliable pilot was sent to hold of Zaarin's forces which consisted of TIE Advanced, the Modified Frigate Raptor and TIE bombers. Nomme managed to board Omar 2 and evacuated most, but not all, of the personnel and escaped the battle into Hyperspace.
